idea-plugin.name: Base16 Gruvbox Material Light, Soft
idea-plugin.vendor: Mayush Kumar (https://github.com/MayushKumar), sainnhe (https://github.com/sainnhe/gruvbox-material-vscode), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Gruvbox Material Light, Soft for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Mayush Kumar (https://github.com/MayushKumar), sainnhe (https://github.com/sainnhe/gruvbox-material-vscode). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
